name: Tyr: Chains of Valhalla
description: Tyr: Chains of Valhalla is 2.5D platform videogame full of action, robots and vikings. Break into Valhalla to save humanity from the hands of evil in this cyberpunk nordic universe.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Kaby Lake Core M3-7Y30 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphic 615 / AMD Radeon HD 6750M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3-7100 @ 3.9GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
